##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition

##  Weapon stats 

The weapon stats for this item are as follows:
* '''Damage:''' 8-10 {{crush}}
* '''Penetration:''' 7
* '''Attack Time:''' 0.5 sec
* '''Recovery Time:''' 3.0 sec

Note that this shield gains bonus damage, pen, and accuracy from [Transcendent Suffering](/transcendentSufferingDeadfire/) just like unarmed attacks do.

| name              = Tuotilo's Palm
| icon              = poe2 small_shield_tuotilos_palm_icon.png
| description       = Tuotilo was a struggling metallurgist who supplemented his meager income by fighting in high-stakes boxing matches. Boxing proved to be the more lucrative venture and he eventually abandoned his forge to devote the entirety of his time to training and fighting. He proved to be quite skilled and quickly rose to prominence in the boxing circuit. He became so confident in his strength that he claimed his hands were strong enough to stop the blade of a sword. He even challenged the renowned duelist Ri Golan to a bout to prove his claim. During the fight, before a cheering crowd, Tuotilo lost his left hand to her sabre.

A hard lesson learned, Tuotilo returned to his forge. Unwilling to admit his time as a master fighter had ended, he forged this impressive shield as a replacement for his missing hand. This new hand could not hold a hammer, but it could strike and parry, and that was good enough for him.
